name: RIFF VR
description: RIFF VR is a one of a kind music role playing experience. Use VR technology to become the guitarist, drummer, or singer of your own band. Customize performance environments and band setups. Stream your gameplay with built in OBS and LIV support.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
